Hotel.name: Aparthotel Adagio Paris Centre Tour Eiffel

Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Paris (Gare Montparnasse - Porte de Versailles), Aparthotel Adagio Paris Centre Tour Eiffel is minutes from Beaugrenelle and Statue of Liberty - Paris. This 4-star residence is close to Eiffel Tower and Arc de Triomphe.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 375 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an indoor pool and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Paris? This residence has facilities measuring 538 square feet (50 square meters), including meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

The preferred airport for Aparthotel Adagio Paris Centre Tour Eiffel is Paris (ORY-Orly) - 14.4 km / 8.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

RoomType.text: Studio Apartment with Eiffel Tower View + Free Internet

Message.Text:
Room 1

Notice
Baby-cot is provided for free for baby from 0 to 2 years old sharing the apartment with parents.


•Cleaning: For stays 1 to 7 nights, prices include end of stay cleaning For stays of 8 nights and more, the prices include weekly cleaning •For stays of 8 nights or more, a weekly housekeeping service included. •For stays up to 7 nights, optional housekeeping service available on request. Additional paid services: Bedding and Towels or full housekeeping service Daily parking fee Local Tax Additional regional tax
